remarks: Intended replacement for Sigil I's ending text.
Intended replacement for Sigil II's ending text.

default: Are you sure you want to quit playing Undertale 2?
You're still here-? Don't you have anything better to do?
\c[DeltaSusie]Hey, who said you could quit this game!? You know what that means, dumbass.\c-
\c[DeltaRalsei]Oh? Uh- yeah! Take a break anytime you want, OK?\c-

remarks: thanks for the idea arsalan lmao (if you're poking around and you see this, check out sonic lock and load! it's a big reason i got into doom modding in the first place lol)

default: Fine, leave. I'm sure your desktop is SO much better.
remarks: wanted to make a joke about windows initially, but you may not necessarily be running this on windows (i know i'll eventually probably be running this on linux again)
